question.questionText: Lee has an object he wants to test to see if it is an insulator or a conductor. He is going to use the circuit you see in the picture. How will he know if the object is a conductor?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: If the motor runs, the object is a conductor.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The motor will run that is how you will know.
He will know because the motor will run.
